chapter.title: &oneview;
chapter.para: This page allows you to view and provision hardware that is managed by &oneview; into ESXi compute clusters.

listitem.para: The search bar allows you to filter the servers you want to view. State and Hypervisor are examples of server criteria that can be specified. Additionally, you can filter by typing in text similar to searching by keywords.
You can sort using the column headers in the table.
View and provision hardware that is managed by &oneview; into activated ESXi compute clusters.

important.para: Check the Support Matrix for required versions of &oneview; to enable these features.
